adjectives.description: tawie (comparative more tawie, superlative most tawie)

entries.meaning: (Scotland, of an animal) Docile or tractable to the extent of allowing itself to be handled without complaint.
examples: Tho' ye was trickie, slee, an' funnie, / Ye ne'er was donsie; / But hamely, tawie, quiet, an' cannie, / An' unco sonsie.
